segments.text: Yes , what sort of warranty comes with this stereo ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , our store offers a 90 - Day return policy and the manufacturer offers a one-year warranty on any factory defects .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: What conditions are there on the store policy ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: We ’ ll give you your money back as long as the stereo is returned in the original packaging and with a receipt .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: O . K . How do I get the manufacturer ’ s warranty ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Just send in the warranty card with a copy of your receipt .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: All right , those sound good . I ’ ll take it .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Very well , I can ring you up over here , sir .
segments.speaker: S1
